Articles.Content:
Hi, I wasn't sure where to put this.

I searched steam skins and saw an outdated Skin someone made in 2014, but their link no longer works, and I wonder if there are any other space or kerbal themed steam skins anyone knows about.
There are a few profile backgrounds you can unlock with trading cards, or buy in the marketplace:  https://steamcommunity.com/market/search?q=kerbal
